results.text: Your most recent composition is shaping up to be something great. You have advantage on your next Performance check.

One audience member in particular was taken with your performance. They offer to introduce you to a person of importance in the area and put in a good word for you, such as a guildmaster, a minor noble, or a notable merchant.
Your performance is truly moving. The attitude of creatures who witnessed this improve towards you by one step.
The audience is utterly enthralled by your performance. For the next minute, any attempts by an audience member to look away (such as to perform a Perception check) are made at disadvantage.

You know you’re good at what you do but even you didn’t realize you were this good. You gain temporary inspiration that lasts for the next hour. If this inspiration is not used before the duration is up, it disappears.

You catch the eyes of many passersby, and even those who don’t stop to watch are willing to toss you a coin or two. You earn enough money to maintain a Moderate lifestyle for the day for you and your companions.
